title: An Immersed Boundary Method for Polymeric Continuous Mixing
authors: G. Negrini, N. Parolini, M. Verani
abstract:
We introduce a new implementation of the Immersed Boundary method in the
finite-volume library OpenFOAM. The implementation is tailored to the
simulation of temperature-dependent non-Newtonian polymeric flows in complex
moving geometries, such as those characterizing the most popular polymeric
mixing technologies.
